transcript:
Customer: Madam uske liye abhi

Customer: Tenu itna main pyar kara ek pal vich sau baar kara

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan hello bataiye na.

Executive: Aryan Kumar ji baat kar rahe hain Murli Shah Enterprises se.

Customer: Haan Aryan hi baat kar raha bataiye na.

Executive: Namaskar sir main senior se baat kar rahi hu India Mart ke office se kal aapka sir ek feedback aaya tha mere employee ke interaction ke sath jab aapne unse baat kari thi na to whatsapp pe ek message aata hai ki aap unke service se aap unki baato se satisfied hai ki nahi to usse sir aapne not satisfied aap log service dete nahi dekhiye kya ho raha hai aapko simple batate hain aap

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Customer number to maal nahi kharida sirf inquiry karta hai bhaiya ye maal

Customer: To koi bhi inquiry kar leta hai man lijiye income aai na raha kam hoi na raha business badhi na raha.

Customer: To payment lagayega subah bataiye.

Executive: Accha matlab aap keh rahe ho sir koi inquiry jo generate ho rahi hai wo aapke kaam ki nahi ho rahi hai wo aapse maal le hi nahi raha hai.

Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai Aryan sir.

Customer: Haan haan awaz aa rahi hai bataiye na.

Executive: Main keh rahi hu sir ki jaise aap ye keh rahe ho ki jo bhi aapse buyer connect kar raha hai wo aapse maal le nahi raha hai keval inquiry generate kar raha hai.

Customer: Bas bas bas khali inquiry matlab

Executive: Thik hai thik hai. baat karega ki aapka maal jayega ye karega usko lena hai bhai to lena nahi rehta hai matlab aap log kya karte karte hai

Executive: Sir thoda sa aap network wale area mein chale jaiye aapka voice jo hai wo bahut kat raha hai.

Customer: To ek kaam kariye mam abhi thoda kuch kaam karwa rahe hain humko aap sham ko phone dijiye 4 baje 4 baje baat karte hain aapse free hoke.

Executive: Thik hai na.

Executive: 4 baje tak free honge sir.

Customer: Haan 4 baje free hu are usko upload karwao fatak se hello aapko na haan sir main keh rahi hu main aapko apna number bhi whatsapp pe dal deti hu in case aap 4 baje se pehle free ho jate ho to aap mujhe ek bar call kar lena kyuki mere pass ek ek open ho jata hai aapka concern ka to wo yahan se main band kar rahi hu lekin aap mujhe call kar lena sir main aapko khud se 4 baje tak kar lungi but aap beech mein free ho jao to aap mujhe call laga lena thik hai.

Customer: Okay okay okay.

Executive: Thik hai main aapka ye resolve karati hu sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with service.

- Inquiries generated are not converting into sales.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive will call back at 4 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, not satisfied, follow up
